reviewText: Too bad there is no zero rating. Honestly, this is a good documentary-movie on how to...But, it is not a 3D movie. Basically they have taken an actual DVD and tried to do gimmicky color reproductions. I won't buy it...and willing to give it away for free. Plus they don't work with regular 3D glasses. You basically need to purchase old fashion 3D (Blue/red) glasses. It comes with cheaper paper red/blue 3D glasses that did not fit over my eyes. I wasted my money and learnt a valuable lesson.
